question: Noah studied different systems in the human body. Which best describes a function of veins in the circulatory system?
candidate_answers: (A) carrying blood from the body to the heart (B) supplying nutrients from the intestines to the body (C) carrying carbon dioxide from the body to the lungs (D) passing waste materials from the blood to outside the body
answer: passing waste materials from the blood to outside the body
label: D
